institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 2 (scope of application)
contents: Article 2 (Scope of Application) ① Matters related to industry-led youth customized training projects shall be subject to these rules, except as specifically stipulated in laws and other internal regulations. ② Matters not specified in these rules shall be subject to “contracts to which the state is a party.” Contract-related laws and regulations and corporate accounting standards, such as the “Act on the Act,” the enforcement ordinance and enforcement regulations of the same Act, and the accounting rules, notices, notices, and instructions of relevant ministries such as the Ministry of Strategy and Finance, shall apply mutatis mutandis.
